WelcomePage.title: 👋 About Me
WelcomePage.content1: Hi, I'm Narek Hovhannisyan 👨‍💻, a software developer from Yerevan, Armenia. I love creating software that is both powerful and easy to use 💡.
WelcomePage.content2: On the back end, I use .NET (C#) and Node.js to build reliable and efficient systems ⚙️. For the front end, I work with React, Vite, Next.js, and Vue.js to design user-friendly websites and apps 💻. I also develop mobile apps using Expo and React Native 📱, which allows me to make apps that work on both iOS and Android.
WelcomePage.content3: I enjoy solving problems 🧠 and learning new tools 🛠️ to improve my skills.
WelcomePage.content4: Feel free to check out my projects, connect with me, or download my CV to learn more! 📂

ContactPage.title: Get in Touch
ContactPage.contactBottomTitle: Alternatively, reach out through social media!

NewProjectInfo.title: Coming Soon!
NewProjectInfo.content: My new project is coming. I can't wait to share it with you!
